languages.text: Вольный Торговец направил{mf|ся|ась} вперед, чтобы отыскать огневую позицию, откуда будет видно сражение. Внезапно жуткая тень выскочила прямо на Лорд-капитана. Снег и тьма скрывали ее, превращая в едва различимый силуэт, источающий обещание смерти.

The Rogue Trader strides ahead to find a firing position from which {mf|he|she} can view the battle. Suddenly, an eerie shadow leaps out of nowhere straight at the Lord Captain. It is cloaked by the snow and dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец направил{mf|ся|ась} вперед, чтобы отыскать огневую позицию, откуда будет видно сражение. Внезапно жуткая тень выскочила прямо на Лорд-капитана. Снег и тьма скрывали ее, превращая в едва различимый силуэт, источающий обещание смерти.

It is cloaked by the snow and dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

It is cloaked by the snow and dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

The Rogue Trader strides ahead to find a firing position from which {mf|he|she} can view the battle. Suddenly, an eerie shadow leaps out of nowhere straight at the Lord Captain. It is cloaked by the snow and dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

languages.text: 行商浪人大步流星地朝前走去，寻找着可以鸟瞰战场的狙击位置。突然之间，某个阴森恐怖的黑影蹿了出来，直扑向舰长大人。黑影隐藏在大雪与黑暗之中，变成了一个几乎无法辨别的轮廓，散发着死亡的气息。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader strides ahead to find a firing position from which {mf|he|she} can view the battle. Suddenly, an eerie shadow leaps out of nowhere straight at the Lord Captain. It is cloaked by the snow and dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人大步流星地朝前走去，寻找着可以鸟瞰战场的狙击位置。突然之间，某个阴森恐怖的黑影蹿了出来，直扑向舰长大人。黑影隐藏在大雪与黑暗之中，变成了一个几乎无法辨别的轮廓，散发着死亡的气息。

languages.text: 自由開拓者は戦場を一望できる射撃位置を探すためにずんずん進んでいく。突然、不気味な影がどこからともなく飛び出し、ロード・キャプテンにまっすぐ向かってくる。雪と闇をまとった影はかろうじて識別できる程度のシルエットとなり、逃れられない死の臭いを漂わせている。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader strides ahead to find a firing position from which {mf|he|she} can view the battle. Suddenly, an eerie shadow leaps out of nowhere straight at the Lord Captain. It is cloaked by the snow and dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者は戦場を一望できる射撃位置を探すためにずんずん進んでいく。突然、不気味な影がどこからともなく飛び出し、ロード・キャプテンにまっすぐ向かってくる。雪と闇をまとった影はかろうじて識別できる程度のシルエットとなり、逃れられない死の臭いを漂わせている。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente se adelanta para encontrar una posición de tiro desde la que pueda tener una panorámica de la batalla. De repente, una sombra siniestra se abalanza repentinamente sobre {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Está oculta por la nieve y la oscuridad, por lo que se tronca en una silueta apenas perceptible que emana la promesa de la muerte.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader strides ahead to find a firing position from which {mf|he|she} can view the battle. Suddenly, an eerie shadow leaps out of nowhere straight at the Lord Captain. It is cloaked by the snow and dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente se adelanta para encontrar una posición de tiro desde la que pueda tener una panorámica de la batalla. De repente, una sombra siniestra se abalanza repentinamente sobre {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Está oculta por la nieve y la oscuridad, por lo que se tronca en una silueta apenas perceptible que emana la promesa de la muerte.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} part chercher une position de tir d'où {mf|il|elle} pourra observer la bataille. Soudain, une ombre surgit de nulle part et se jette sur {mf|lui|elle}. La silhouette dont émane une promesse de mort est tout juste perceptible à travers la neige et l'obscurité qui la dissimulent.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader strides ahead to find a firing position from which {mf|he|she} can view the battle. Suddenly, an eerie shadow leaps out of nowhere straight at the Lord Captain. It is cloaked by the snow and dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} part chercher une position de tir d'où {mf|il|elle} pourra observer la bataille. Soudain, une ombre surgit de nulle part et se jette sur {mf|lui|elle}. La silhouette dont émane une promesse de mort est tout juste perceptible à travers la neige et l'obscurité qui la dissimulent.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} geht voraus und sucht eine Schussposition, von der aus {mf|er|sie} den Kampf beobachten kann. Plötzlich springt ein unheimlicher Schatten den Lord Captain aus dem Nichts heraus direkt an. Schnee und Dunkelheit umgeben ihn und bilden eine kaum wahrnehmbare Silhouette, die den sicheren Tod ankündigt.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader strides ahead to find a firing position from which {mf|he|she} can view the battle. Suddenly, an eerie shadow leaps out of nowhere straight at the Lord Captain. It is cloaked by the snow and dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} geht voraus und sucht eine Schussposition, von der aus {mf|er|sie} den Kampf beobachten kann. Plötzlich springt ein unheimlicher Schatten den Lord Captain aus dem Nichts heraus direkt an. Schnee und Dunkelheit umgeben ihn und bilden eine kaum wahrnehmbare Silhouette, die den sicheren Tod ankündigt.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, savaşı net bir şekilde görebileceği bir saldırı pozisyonu bulmak üzere harekete geçiyor. Nereden geldiği belli olmayan ürpertici bir düşman, bir anda üzerine çöküyor. Ona yaklaşanlara ölüm vaadinde bulunan varlık, yoğun kar ve karanlığın içinde zar zor seçiliyor.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader strides ahead to find a firing position from which {mf|he|she} can view the battle. Suddenly, an eerie shadow leaps out of nowhere straight at the Lord Captain. It is cloaked by the snow and dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, savaşı net bir şekilde görebileceği bir saldırı pozisyonu bulmak için önden gitti. Aniden nereden geldiği belli olmayan ürpertici bir gölge üzerine çöktü. Kar ve karanlıkla gizlenen düşman; etrafına ölüm vaadi yayan, zar zor görülebilen bir silüete bürünmüştü.
